item.title: Running in Pig in Local Mode in Java
item.description: Overview of steps Create a new maven project Add Hadoop and Pig dependencies Write a small pig script to count words in a file Write a driver program that will run this pig script 1. Create a new maven project mvn archetype:generate -DgroupId=com.example -DartifactId=piglocal -DarchetypeArtifactId=maven-archetype-webapp -DinteractiveMode=false You can now import the project in your IDE. 2. Add Hadoop and Pig dependencies Pig needs the following dependencies: <dependency> <groupId>org.apache.pig</groupId> <artifactId>pig</artifactId> <version>0.17.0</version> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>log4j</groupId> <artifactId>log4j</artifactId> <version>1.
